room_title: Escape room "Sorcerer's Secret" by Mastermind Escape Games in Jacksonville
review: We had so much fun playing Sorcerer's Secret! The puzzles were very clever, the room theme was amazing and the staff were extremely friendly and so much fun. If you're looking to do an escape room in Jacksonville, FL be sure to start here!

room_title: Escape room "Sorcerer's Secret" by Mastermind Escape Games in Jacksonville
review: Tons of fun! We did the sorcerer's secret and I really enjoyed the puzzles we had to crack. A great way to spend an afternoon.

room_title: Escape room "Sorcerer's Secret" by Mastermind Escape Games in Jacksonville
review: We did the Sorcerer's Secret room a had a lot of fun! Challenging without being impossible. Staff was very nice and helpful. I wanted to do another room immediately after escaping with 13 minutes to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Sorcerer's Secret" by Mastermind Escape Games in Jacksonville
review: Fun team effort in the Sorcerer room. We escaped in the nick of time!
